entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
